OOC: thanks.

Bic:

"I know, Trinity..." said sweetly and with sadness Nightlight"I 
know... I'm don'r like neither that anyone of us... It won't 
happen... Aerotaur is strong... "

Nightlight hugged the little girl and sat down, she said "That won't 
happen..."

> She looked up at Nightlight and took a step closer to her. "It's 
not

> crawled out and buried her tear soaked kitten face into 
Nightlight's 
> arm.
